channel.title: Small Project
channel.description:
Hey guys,
since a few days I really got into web developing again, I had a break for a few months because I was really into BO/BO2 :P. I decided to pick it up again because I missed it. I just started with something very small, I currently try to improve my skills on CSS before moving on to more difficult stuff such as PHP or something. Don't laugh at me, I haven't done shit in the past months, though I wasn't that good at all :P. I'll keep working on this.
Preview:
[img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/4330/30a0909cf9ad4a93b30b913.png[/img]
http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/4330/30a0909cf9ad4a93b30b913.png For the whole image.
Like I said, it is basic. I'm just trying to learn :P. Please comment with some constructive critism, or (if you got) some tips, I'd appericiate it :).

item.title: Small Project
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:10, topic:478287”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=596484.msg4200389#msg4200389 date=1358107221]

Try making use of the webfonts offered by google. They’re a great resource and easily interchangeable.

Thanks, I’ll look at this. Got suggestions for a font(s)?
[/quote]
Monda and Unica One are both nice. I’d also use Bench Nine and Montserrat. Those are some of my favorites anyway.[/quote]
LOL. I downloaded & Used Monda even before I read your reply :P. Well, thanks for the suggestions! Also, is there a good resource for some tutorials on CSS? I’ve Googled for a while but couldn’t really find good ones.

Changed the font, now I need somebody to make me a simple logo :P.

I’ll show you guys the original design, which someone made for me, and my current progress.

Original Design:

y1PRE.png1307×746

Mine:

Lx1IN.png1599×775

Please some feedback/tips/suggestions :).

I’ve not done much these days, been very busy with school. I’ll work on this later this week again :).

Read full topic

item.title: Small Project
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“CoderJessee, post:9, topic:478287”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=596484.msg4200246#msg4200246 date=1358086166]
Try making use of the webfonts offered by google. They’re a great resource and easily interchangeable.
[/quote]
Thanks, I’ll look at this. Got suggestions for a font(s)?[/quote]
Monda and Unica One are both nice. I’d also use Bench Nine and Montserrat. Those are some of my favorites anyway.

Read full topic
